data.text: At check in a deposit was made for the full amount for our stay plus a further deposit which at check-out exceeded the actual amount by 969 AED. The hotel promised it would be refunded no later than 4 weeks following our departure. 3 months has passed and despite having contacted the hotel twice the issue is still not resolved!
data.title: Missing Refund

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear TL

Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention, and please accept our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience you have experienced regarding the delay in refunding your deposit.

We understand the frustration this situation has caused, and we sincerely apologize for the delay in resolving this matter. Rest assured, we take your feedback seriously, and we are actively investigating the issue to ensure a prompt resolution.

Please provide us with your reservation details, including the dates of your stay and the name under which the reservation was made, so that we can expedite the refund process and ensure that the overage is returned to you as soon as possible.

Once again, we apologize for any inconvenience caused, and we appreciate your patience and understanding as we work to resolve this matter promptly.

Best Regards,
Rodolphe Pialat
Hotel Manager
Jumeirah Al Qasr & Dar Al Masyaf
owner_response.author: Madinat  Jumeirah

data.text: Best hotel through the years, where I want to be back every time when I am in Dubai. Service is on the highest level and the reason is that the main team is working here for long period of time. One of them is Ashraf, a beach guy who is always smiling and friendly ready to help and really taking care. Once again I am convinced that the human factor has a huge influence and it is the staff who can create a feeling of comfort and the desire to come back for these emotions.
data.title: Big Thanks to the Stuff

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Inna Ts

Thank you for choosing our hotel and for sharing your wonderful feedback with us. We are delighted to hear that your experience with us has been consistently exceptional over the years.

It's heartening to know that you consider our hotel the best and that you always look forward to returning whenever you're in Dubai. We take great pride in providing the highest level of service to our guests, and it's rewarding to hear that our dedicated team, including longtime members like Ashraf, have contributed to making your stays memorable.

Ashraf's commitment to providing friendly and helpful service embodies the values we strive to uphold at our hotel. We will be sure to pass along your kind words to him and the rest of our team.

We couldn't agree more that the human factor plays a significant role in creating a comfortable and welcoming atmosphere for our guests. Our team works tirelessly to ensure that every guest feels valued and cared for during their stay.

Thank you once again for your kind words and loyalty to our hotel. We can't wait to welcome you back for another exceptional stay filled with warmth and hospitality.

With best regards, 
Rodolphe Pialat 
Hotel Manager 
Jumeirah Al Qasr & Dar Al Masyaf
owner_response.author: Madinat  Jumeirah

data.text:
.

The hotel is amazing!! Especially the help and service from Delwar was fantastic. He assisted and helped us so well. A big compliment for you.food service are delay. if you have order need to be reminded many times. That's if your lucky enough that they come to the table after using the "electronic call button". You need to press it at-least 4-5 times before they attend your table.

It's a shame because they have a beautiful beach, with Beautiful smiling man Delwar.you can find out him, He will make you Happy 100%
data.title: Amazing Hotel Amazing experience.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Rajgonova,

Thank you for your feedback! We're thrilled to hear that you found our hotel amazing and that Delwar provided fantastic service. We apologize for the delay in food service and will address this issue promptly. We appreciate your compliments and hope to welcome you back for another happy stay soon.

With best regards, 
Rodolphe Pialat 
Hotel Manager 
Jumeirah Al Qasr & Dar Al Masyaf
owner_response.author: Madinat  Jumeirah

data.text:
Dear Guests!
Important information!
If you want to relax comfortable and do not haul money or card in the hotel to use services, cafe, entertainments, please be advised that in this case you must CREDIT Al Qazr by DEPOSIT and CONTROL by yourself the rest of amount every day.
Otherwise you could be faced suddenly with the situation when YOU can’t use any services w/o any notification from hotel staff. As we faced.
N.B.: we were unpleasant surprised with such new rule this year after 6 years visiting Al Qazr since 2018th year…
data.title: TAKE CARE about DEPOSIT if you want TO RELAX

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Nastya L,

Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention, and please accept our sincere apologies for any inconvenience you experienced due to the new deposit policy.

We understand the importance of transparency in our policies and the impact they have on our guests' experiences. Your feedback is invaluable, and we apologize for any inconvenience caused by this change, especially considering your long history of staying with us.

We will review our communication practices to ensure that guests are informed of any new policies or changes well in advance of their arrival. Additionally, we will work to improve our notification processes to ensure that guests are aware of any limitations or restrictions on services during their stay.

Once again, we apologize for any frustration or inconvenience you experienced, and we appreciate your understanding as we work to address this issue.

Best Regards,
Rodolphe Pialat
Hotel Manager
Jumeirah Al Qasr & Dar Al Masyaf
owner_response.author: Madinat  Jumeirah

data.text: A wonderful stay at this hotel. The food was excellent with such a vast choice in Arboretum for breakfast and dinner - there really is something for everyone. A special thank you to Midhun the pool attendant - such a lovely young man who worked extremely hard. Even when he wasn't working the section we were sat in, he would stop by to ensure everything was ok and to check if we had everything we needed; he was very professional and such a hard worker. It was a real pleasure to meet you Midhun and we wish you every success in your career.
data.title: Thank you for a wonderful week

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 838tn,

Thank you so much for your wonderful review of our hotel. We are thrilled to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us.

A special thank you for recognizing Midhun, our pool attendant. It means a lot to us to hear that his dedication and hard work were noticed and appreciated during your stay. We will be sure to pass on your kind words to him, and we're confident that he will continue to excel in his career.

Thank you once again for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to share your positive feedback. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back for another wonderful stay in the future.

With best regards, 
Rodolphe Pialat 
Hotel Manager 
Jumeirah Al Qasr & Dar Al Masyaf
owner_response.author: Madinat  Jumeirah
